The Routing Loop

Thursdays 10:30AM-12:00PM PST / 1:30PM-3:00PM EST / 6:30PM-8:00PM GMT

Twitch/AWS

10 October 2024

Automating Networking Monitoring and Alerting on AWS, and the AWS Solutions Library

Hosts:
Jamie and Matt

Guests:
Luis Guirigay - Head, Solutions, AWS Solutions Library, AWS
Daniel Zilberman - Sr SA, AWS Solutions Library, AWS
Zoran Pucar - Principal TAM, AWS

Abstract:
In this session, we'll dive into guidance for Automating Network Monitoring and Alerting on AWS, a must have for any network focused cloud engineer. We'll also take some time to dive into the AWS Solutions Library, and other solutions that are on offer. Bring your questions!
